path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Fall 24/Clinical-Lvn Training/Documents/Relative-Observer Assignment.docx
text: Temple College VNSG 1460 Clinical LVN Training II Relative/Observer Assignment You will be playing the role of a relative to the patient in simulation. You will get to decide your own role. Answer the following questions. What relative will you be playing? (Sister, brother, mother, father, husband, partner) What type of relative will you be? (Overbearing, rude, nervous, anxious, asks lots of questions) Provide a small script of what you will say and how you will act as the relative.
